mapper.sql: bMS_code, operator_id, connector_id, startTime, endTime, station_id, equipment_id, bMS_ver, esti_r, remain_capacity, charge_time, sOH, remark_1, soc, voltage_h, voltage_l, tempture_h, tempture_l, beforeSoc, afterSoc, statistical_date, statistical_week, statistical_month, statistical_season,statistical_year
mapper.insert:
insert into ana_bms_single_charge
bMS_code,
operator_id,
connector_id,
startTime,
endTime,
station_id,
equipment_id,
bMS_ver,
esti_r,
remain_capacity,
charge_time,
sOH,
remark_1,
soc,
voltage_h,
voltage_l,
tempture_h,
tempture_l,
beforeSoc,
afterSoc,
statistical_date,
statistical_week,
statistical_month,
statistical_season,
statistical_year,
#{bMSCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{connectorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bMSVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{estiR,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remainCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{chargeTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sOH,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{soc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{voltageH,jdbcType= REAL},
#{voltageL,jdbcType= REAL},
#{temptureH,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{temptureL,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{beforeSoc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{afterSoc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{statisticalDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{statisticalWeek,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{statisticalMonth,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{statisticalSeason,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{statisticalYear,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT b.bms_code, b.operator_id, b.station_id, b.equipment_id, b.connector_id, a.statistics_times, a.statistical_date as statistical_day FROM ( SELECT bms_code, operator_id, connector_id, statistical_date, count(bms_code) AS statistics_times FROM `ana_bms_single_charge` WHERE statistical_date = #{statisticalDate,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY bms_code, statistical_date, operator_id, connector_id ) a, ana_bms_single_charge b WHERE a.bms_code = b.bms_code AND a.connector_id = b.connector_id AND a.operator_id = b.operator_id

SELECT DISTINCT b.bms_code, b.operator_id, b.station_id, b.equipment_id, b.connector_id, a.statistics_times, a.statistical_week FROM ( SELECT bms_code, operator_id, connector_id, statistical_week, count(bms_code) AS statistics_times FROM `ana_bms_single_charge` WHERE statistical_week = #{statisticalWeek,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY bms_code, statistical_week, operator_id, connector_id ) a, ana_bms_single_charge b WHERE a.bms_code = b.bms_code AND a.connector_id = b.connector_id AND a.operator_id = b.operator_id

SELECT DISTINCT b.bms_code, b.operator_id, b.station_id, b.equipment_id, b.connector_id, a.statistics_times, a.statistical_month FROM ( SELECT bms_code, operator_id, connector_id, statistical_month, count(bms_code) AS statistics_times FROM `ana_bms_single_charge` WHERE statistical_month = #{statisticalMonth,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY bms_code, statistical_month, operator_id, connector_id ) a, ana_bms_single_charge b WHERE a.bms_code = b.bms_code AND a.connector_id = b.connector_id AND a.operator_id = b.operator_id

SELECT DISTINCT b.bms_code, b.operator_id, b.station_id, b.equipment_id, b.connector_id, a.statistics_times, a.statistical_season FROM ( SELECT bms_code, operator_id, connector_id, statistical_season, count(bms_code) AS statistics_times FROM `ana_bms_single_charge` WHERE statistical_season = #{statisticalSeason,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY bms_code, statistical_season, operator_id, connector_id ) a, ana_bms_single_charge b WHERE a.bms_code = b.bms_code AND a.connector_id = b.connector_id AND a.operator_id = b.operator_id

SELECT DISTINCT b.bms_code, b.operator_id, b.station_id, b.equipment_id, b.connector_id, a.statistics_times, a.statistical_year FROM ( SELECT bms_code, operator_id, connector_id, statistical_year, count(bms_code) AS statistics_times FROM `ana_bms_single_charge` WHERE statistical_year = #{statisticalYear,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY bms_code, statistical_year, operator_id, connector_id ) a, ana_bms_single_charge b WHERE a.bms_code = b.bms_code AND a.connector_id = b.connector_id AND a.operator_id = b.operator_id

SELECT bms_code, voltage_h, voltage_l, beforeSoc, afterSoc, tempture_h, tempture_l, sOH, esti_r, remain_capacity, startTime, endTime FROM ana_bms_single_charge WHERE startTime= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND endTime= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND bMS_code = #{param.bMSCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND operator_id = #{param.operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND connector_id = #{param.connectorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
